apps/web/src/components/ui/alert.tsx.description: Alert component now has 5 variants: default, destructive, success, warning, and info. All colored variants follow the same pattern: 'text-{color} bg-card [&>svg]:text-current *:data-[slot=alert-description]:text-{color}/90'

apps/web/src/app/globals.css.description: Uses OKLCH color system. Color tokens defined in :root and .dark blocks. Tailwind color mappings in @theme inline block (e.g., --color-destructive: var(--destructive)). Currently no success/warning/info tokens exist.
